meanings.definition: A person who crams for an exam.
meanings.sent1: The crammers stayed up all night studying for the test.
meanings.sent2: During finals week, many students turn into crammers.
meanings.sent3: The crammers were so focused on studying that they forgot to eat dinner.
meanings.sent4: The group of crammers resembled busy bees buzzing around the library.
meanings.sent5: The image of the crammers huddled together with books piled high is unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A study method involving intense, last-minute preparation.
meanings.sent1: Using crammers may help in short-term memory retention.
meanings.sent2: Some students find success with crammers, while others prefer consistent studying.
meanings.sent3: The crammers rushed to finish their notes before the exam started.
meanings.sent4: The idea of crammers frantically flipping through textbooks is quite dramatic.
meanings.sent5: The sound of crammers shuffling papers echoed through the classroom.

meanings.definition: A company or organization that provides exam preparation services.
meanings.sent1: The crammers in town offer various test prep packages.
meanings.sent2: Students often seek help from crammers to improve their scores.
meanings.sent3: The crammers' office was filled with students eager to learn.
meanings.sent4: The crammers' logo, a brain lifting weights, symbolizes their dedication to education.
meanings.sent5: The billboard advertising the crammers' services caught the attention of many students.
